title: New music and Voice over (its not what you think)
body:
Now i bet, looking at the title, i bet you thought this was another "this new music and voice over is terrible, remove it".
However, its quite the opposite, and i just want to say that they are absolutely amazing and i love them very much, playing the same game for...i don't want to know how many hours with the same voice over...and no music is rather...dull, this change is fantastic.
I would love to see an option that would allow to change between the pirate V/O and music and normal, (i did see a theme option in the new in game menu, so heres to hoping). On the internet, the people that dislike something are always the loudest, even if they are the minority, and i suspect its the case with this aswell. Heres to you riot, for making an amazing event, with great new features (albeit temporary) and a featured game mode.

Tl;DR: Love the new Voice over and music, would like an option for it to stay
